OK, i have read all the tutorials and posts i can find, several times...

I have my external model, (hatch/ladders ok)

I have my internal model,

All is good and i can place props etc, everything is oriented ok, my IVA stuff is set to either layer 16 (kerbals) or layer 20 (internal space),

My problem is that my external model seems to be blocking the view through my translucent IVA window..... (if i remove external window mesh i can see fine, but then I no longer have an ext window mesh!)

I have tried rescaling my IVA from 1 to 1.25, my models are @ 0, 0, 0 with their gameobjects etc

Any hints, clues or directions are appreciated please.
